lines.text: [Sgt. Tucker laughs about the camels and Sgt. Tibbs' men]
Sgt. Tucker, do you wish to be on report?
Do you wish to be on a camel?
Well, er, nothing personal, but, no, sir.
Then change your attitude towards these men or you'll be on both!
I'm ready! I'm loose! I'm walking death and destruction!
My calling card is this belt I made from a rattlesnake, who's head I bit off on a bet!
Just because you fell into a river and didn't catch some old Indian doesn't mean it's the end of the world, you know.
